events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on a busy intersection, involving significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords such as vehicle, accident, and collision mentioned in the report.
An agent was assigned to handle the claim, ensuring direct contact with the claimant for further process coordination.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer expressing our commitment to support and resolve the issue promptly.
Request was made for the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the claimant's driving license for verification.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos, allowing investigation to proceed.
The investigation commenced with an initial assessment of the accident scene details and involvement of both drivers.
Investigation concluded confirming claimant was not at fault and damage estimates have been verified by our assessors.
A settlement amount covering full repair costs was proposed and communicated to the claimant for approval.
The claimant appreciated the smooth process and clear communication throughout the investigation and settlement phases.
Claim approval was finalized, ensuring that the proposed settlement will be processed without delay for the customer.
Payment was issued directly to the repair shop as per the claimant's preference, enabling immediate vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of repair completion and no further issues reported by the claimant.
All claim documentation and communications have been archived in the system for future reference and audit compliance.
